title: Camera should work when app minimized
body: Camera should work when app is minimized. If UWP is to take over for Win32 this is basic requirement. User can't be expected to keep the window maximized. This makes sense for phones and tablet mode, but for desktop and dedicated use devices it's just a limitation.

comments.body: Hello anonymous, can you please help how to request the camera when minimized?
Note requesting the camera when minimized does work in most cases. However why drop and interrupt the stream in those cases and fire a MediaCapture_CameraStreamStateChanged?
